(as of Nov 30,2022 10:00:13 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Hello, Ladies and Gentlemen!

Whether you’re taking a road trip or commuting to work, if you have a family or spend a lot of time traveling from place to place in your car, having a car trash can is an easy way to keep your vehicle’s interior tidy. We’re all guilty of tossing crumpled-up napkins, crumbs, change into our cup holders. Avoid the buildup of trash with a Vankor car trash can! In order to meet the aesthetics of a wider range of car interior decoration styles and people, we have designed solid and floral pattern. Before launching these car trash bags, we thoroughly checked it for capacity, ease of installation, and additional features, including dual functionality as a car organizer. These auto trash bag will keep you organized and make it easier to throw out your garbage. Okay, Just start your travel now!

Car Trash Can with Lid

Soft lid to put the bottle and other car trash easily. Don’t worry about soiled by unfinished drinks.

Waterproof & Seamless Linning

100% leak-proof lining to ensure your car is dry & neat.

Adjustable Buckle & Strudy Stitching

Car trash bag hanging is designed for most car, trucks, minivans, campers; You can install easily it in somewhere of your car. Strudy Stitching to ensure it has a long service life.

As a Car Trash Can

It is easy to collect wrappers, receipts, and odds and ends in your car. For it to not look dirty and cluttered, keep a car trash can in your car.

As a Car Cooler

These car trash cans are even insulated, which means you can use them as a cooler when traveling to visit family.

As a Storage Bag

Having a garbage can in the car is the best way to storage snacks and food for the car.

Universal Compatibility

Make everywhere clean: the multifunction trash can not only make your car clean and tidy but also hold up lots of garbage or food at some situations like Family Gathering, Journey, Picnic, Camping, Short Trip, Beach and so on.

Date First Available ‏ : ‎ April 1, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Vankor
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09X36F1ZK

【KEEP YOUR CAR CLEAN】- Are you always bothered by the messy of the car interior? Vankor’s car trash can with lid will help you to solve this annoyance. This cute car trash can will be helpful for keeping your car clutter-free, ensuring you are in a good mood while driving. Large car trash can with an adjustable strap is hung on the gear shift, glove box, headrest. You can also display the hanging car trash bag on the floor, hanging on the back seat, co-driver seat, or any place in your car.
【MULTIPURPOSE STORAGE】- Vankor car garbage can is functional, you can put the car garbage into the main bag, there are 3 outer pouch pockets of garbage can for car that will be great to help storage. You can put tissue packs, wipes, snacks, umbrellas, and other little things that you need to keep in your car to avoid mess, and for easy access. In addition, the waterproof performance also achieves the automotive garbage cans an excellent storage bag when you are camping or picnicking.
【INTIMATE DESIGN & CAPACITY 】- There are 2 side clasps for fixing disposable bags, effectively preventing falling out. Car trash bags have about 2 .5 Gallons for storage of car garbage or other stuff. Car trash bin has 100% leak-proof PEVA thick lining, no spillages will happen and is easy to be cleaned. The extra-large opening is made of elastic soft rubber, very roomy and easier to put litter into the bag, and helps to keep trash from spilling.
【WIDE COMPATIBILITY 】– An thoughtful solution for people who have the need for car neat and car interior storage. Perfectly fits varieties of types of vehicles including sedans, SUVs, RVs, trucks, vans, minivans, boats, campers, taxis, buses, etc. Auto trash can for car is very sturdy and durable, has a long service life, and is very convenient to carry. The car trash can for the back seat is foldable, When you don’t need it, just fold it up without taking up any space.
【STRICT QUALITY CONTROL】- Our company specializes in the portable car trash can for car, and every product is strictly inspected before it goes to the Amazon warehouse. Waterproof car trash can’s pictures are shot with an HD camera to ensure the authenticity of the product colors and details. Vankor aims to provide customers with a better product experience of car trash can bags and offer effective solutions for you.


Hello, Ladies and Gentlemen!

Whether you’re taking a road trip or commuting to work, if you have a family or spend a lot of time traveling from place to place in your car, having a car trash can is an easy way to keep your vehicle’s interior tidy. We’re all guilty of tossing crumpled-up napkins, crumbs, change into our cup holders. Avoid the buildup of trash with a Vankor car trash can! In order to meet the aesthetics of a wider range of car interior decoration styles and people, we have designed solid and floral pattern. Before launching these car trash bags, we thoroughly checked it for capacity, ease of installation, and additional features, including dual functionality as a car organizer. These auto trash bag will keep you organized and make it easier to throw out your garbage. Okay, Just start your travel now!

It is easy to collect wrappers, receipts, and odds and ends in your car. For it to not look dirty and cluttered, keep a car trash can in your car.

As a Car Cooler

These car trash cans are even insulated, which means you can use them as a cooler when traveling to visit family.

As a Storage Bag

Having a garbage can in the car is the best way to storage snacks and food for the car.

Read more


Universal Compatibility

Make everywhere clean: the multifunction trash can not only make your car clean and tidy but also hold up lots of garbage or food at some situations like Family Gathering, Journey, Picnic, Camping, Short Trip, Beach and so on.

item.title: Automotive Smoke Machine | Built-in Air Motor | EVAP Vacuum Leak Detector Tester | Shop Series Plus | Made in The USA
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) 【 NEW BUILT-IN AIR MOTOR】No need for a separate air supply!【 HIGH PERFORMANCE, PREMIUM BUILD】Made in the USA. Solid Thick Metal Construction for durability. Equipped with our brand new AutoLine Pro Ceramic Smoke Coil that outputs LOTS OF SMOKE and last a Lifetime. (Lifetime Guarantee!)【 DIAGNOSE ALL TYPES OF LEAKS ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $149.99 - $129.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:20:40 UTC – Details)



【 NEW BUILT-IN AIR MOTOR】No need for a separate air supply!
【 HIGH PERFORMANCE, PREMIUM BUILD】Made in the USA. Solid Thick Metal Construction for durability. Equipped with our brand new AutoLine Pro Ceramic Smoke Coil that outputs LOTS OF SMOKE and last a Lifetime. (Lifetime Guarantee!)
【 DIAGNOSE ALL TYPES OF LEAKS WITH ADAPTERS】Consistently smoke test EVAP systems, Vacuum leaks, low pressure Turbo leaks, Intake Manifolds, Cooling / EGR / Exhaust Systems, worn rubber, gaskets, seals, connectors, and more! The tapered smoke injection nozzle fits into virtually all hoses and lines.
【 PRECISE AND SAFE】Engineered 100% safe for all vehicles. Thick Smoke output detects even the smallest leaks. Every unit Is backed by 1 YEAR FULL COVERAGE WARRANTY! AS AN AMERICAN FAMILY BUSINESS, we stand proudly behind our products. If you have any issues, don’t hesitate to contact us directly.
【 HOW DOES IT WORK?】(1) Fill with the included OEM Approved Smoke Fluid. The kit operates with the included OEM Approved Fluid or you may use your own USP Mineral Oil / Baby Oil. (2) Fasten the Power Cable (3) Warm up for 3 minutes and then turn on the Built-In Air Motor. (4) Check for LEAKS with Smoke Detection Technology.

4.5
Price: $149.99 - $129.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:20:40 UTC – Details)

item.title: Automotive Smoke Leak Tester,EVAP Smoke Machine Diagnostic Leak Detector,Car Pipe Vacuum Leakage Tester & Fuel Pipe Leakage Detector for All 12V Cars
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Technical Details Manufacturer ‎VXSCAN Brand ‎VXSCAN Item Weight ‎5.26 pounds Package Dimensions ‎11.54 x 9.84 x 6.81 inches Country of Origin ‎China Manufacturer Part Number ‎V3 Additional Information ASIN B0B1M7NPXT Customer Reviews 5.0 out of 5 stars 2 ratings 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Sellers Rank #109,767 in Automotive (See Top 100 in Automotive) ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Technical Details

Manufacturer ‎VXSCAN
Brand ‎VXSCAN
Item Weight ‎5.26 pounds
Package Dimensions ‎11.54 x 9.84 x 6.81 inches
Country of Origin ‎China
Manufacturer Part Number ‎V3

Additional Information

ASIN B0B1M7NPXT
Customer Reviews

5.0 out of 5 stars

2 ratings

5.0 out of 5 stars

Best Sellers Rank #109,767 in Automotive (See Top 100 in Automotive)
#45 in Fuel Leak Detectors
#1,777 in Diagnostic, Test & Measurement Tools
Date First Available May 18, 2022

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $165.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:43:34 UTC – Details)

From the brand

About VXSCAN

VXSCAN is focusing on affordable prices, top quality for every customer.

You Can Trust VXSCAN

VXSCAN is to make our products serve everyone in need all over the world. To this end, we will devote ourselves to professional research and strive to make the best of our products and services.

The Goal of VXSCAN

It is aiming to provide automobile repairers with more professional, simple, practical, economical, efficient and high-quality auto diagnosis products and maintenance tools.

The Service of VXSCAN

To provide an better service customer is one of important reasons for our success and our eternal goal.

VXSCAN is committed to doing an professional supplier of automobile maintenance products,focuses on sloving automotive aftermamrket problems cost-effectively,effciently and conveniently.We hope make every user satisfied is our ultimate pursuit of every product.

【EVAP Leak Detector】V3 Smoke machine can easily check car sealing, throttle shafts, engine block, turbo test system, crankcase system, intake system, exhaust system, fuel tank system, EVAP system, EGR system, cooling system, various pipe fittings leakage problems. the provided mineral oil creates smoke that’s pumped it through your vehicle’s piping to help you detect the leak’s precise location.
【Why You Need V3】These Situations – 1.The rupture of the vacuum hose will cause the mixture to be too thick, the idle speed will increase, the hot car will not start well, the engine will surge during acceleration, the fuel consumption will increase significantly, and the exhaust pipe will emit black smoke.2. Blocking will cause the idle speed to drift, and the idle speed is easy to stall.3. Air leakage in the vacuum tube will cause the engine to run weakly.
【Easy Operation】1.Fill 10ml-20ml test oil to the detector.2. Disconnect the intake pipe of the car. Connect the intake pipe of the car with the detector.3. Connect detector with DC12V battery, it starts to work.4.The pipe will be filled with smoke. Check the leak points. Note：The packaging does not contain oil but there is an oil delivery bottle.
【Adjustable Air Flow Meter & Pressure Gauge Display】You can easily control the air pressure, because if the air pressure is too high, the pipe will be damaged, and if the air pressure is too low, the leak will not be detected; You can observe the barometer to determine whether the car pipeline is leaking. If the barometer index keeps increasing, there is no problem with your car’s pipeline. On the contrary, your car’s pipeline leaks need to be repaired.
【Wide Compatibility】Fuel pipe leakage locator is used to detect leakage of pipe systems on automobiles, motorcycles, snowmobiles, ATVs, light trucks, and speedboats. It is suitable for all makes and models of cars.

VXSCAN V3 automotive diagnostic smoke leak detector is designed for testing leaks in vehicle pipe systems.

It could be used on all cars, motorcycles, snowmobiles, ATV, light trucks, boats, etc.

With VXSCAN V3, you can easily check car sealing, throttle shafts, engine block, turbo test system, crankcase system, intake system, exhaust system, fuel tank system, EVAP system, EGR system, cooling system, various pipe fittings leakage problems.

Full System Diagnoses, Won’t Miss Any Leak.

  • Crankcase System Test: Excessive pressure or corrosion of the crankcase is the main reason to damage the seal of the crankcase and cause oil leakage.
  • Intake System Test: Leakage in the air intake system will lead to insufficient intake of the car engine, which will result in scant engine power.
  • Car Sealing Test: Poor airtightness of the car may lead to a lot of inconvenience like inability to keep warm, not soundproof, not waterproof and not dust-proof, etc.
  • Fuel Tank System Test: When there are gaps in the fuel tank and piping caused by improper installation or insufficient sealing of the fuel tank cap, it can cause leaks in the fuel tank system.
  • Turbo Test: The leakage of coolant would cause the engine to report high water temperature.
  • Various Pipe Fitting Test: Smoke testing of brake hoses, power steering hoses, cooling system hoses, air conditioning system hoses, turbocharger hoses, fuel hoses, intake and exhaust system hoses, etc.
  • EVAP System Test: Leakage of the fuel evaporation system will cause fuel vapor to leak into the atmosphere, causing waste and pollution or unstable engine idling.
  • Exhaust System Test: Unpurified harmful gases to be discharged into the atmosphere or increase vehicle noise is the main disadvantage when leaks happened in the exhaust.

How to Operate the Automotive Smoke Leak Detector

Step 1

  • Fill 10ml-20ml test oil to the detector.

Step 2

  • Disconnect the intake pipe of the car. Connect the intake pipe of the car with the detector.

Step 3

  • Connect detector with DC12V battery, it starts to work.

Step 4

  • The pipe will be filled with smoke.Check the leak points.

Read more

Package Includes

  • 1pc x VXSCAN V3 Main Unit
  • 1pc x Standard Cone Adapter (30-85mm)
  • 1pc x Funnel
  • 1pc x Replacement Rubber
  • 1pc x Intake bladder
  • 1pc x Smoke Hose
  • 1pc x Power Cord Clamp
  • 1pc x Test Oil Refill Bottle(oil not included)
  • Package Weight: 2.3kg/5.1 lb
  • Main Unit Dimensions: 7.28*5.11*3.34 inch
  • Package Dimensions: 12.2*9.44*4.52 inch

VXSCAN V3 Vacuum Smoke Tester Functions:

  • Crankcase System Test
  • Intake System Test
  • Car Sealing Test
  • Fuel Tank System Test
  • Turbo Leaks Test
  • Various Pipe Fittings Test
  • Exhaust System Test
  • EVAP System Test

EVAP V3 vacuum leak tester can produce lots of smoke within 30s, help mechanic detect the leaks in pipe system.

  • Product Specifications:
  • Power Supply: 12V Vehicle Battery, <8Amp
  • Output Pressure: <1.2bar
  • Flow Rate: <7L/Min
  • Length of Smoke Hose: 2.5Meters
  • Length of Power Cord: 2.5Meters
  • Working Cycle: 5 Min auto-stop

Read more

2 Mode: No need to buy extra air compressor

Air Mode: Press the AIR MODE, pump starts working, only after this, you may press and start the SMOKE MODE. It can help you test whether there is a leak in the pipe by injecting air into the pipe, and judge by the sound made when the air leaks.

Smoke Mode: After pressing this switch, the power indicator light is on to indicate that the power supply is normal. It helps you lacate the leak accuarately through the visible smoke. The smoke can be produced within seconds, dramatically reducing diagnostic time.

Overheat & Anti-frost Protection: Built in self-protective system

V3 EVAP vacuum tester is equipped with the latest intelligent protection device.

When the temperature of the device exceeds 70 degrees Celsius, the power protection device will be intelligently activated to turn it off, to ensure the safety of the operator and the device.

The device is also suitable for low temperature operation.

Wide Compatibility: Suitable for all vechicles

VXSCAN V3 vacuum leak smoke machine is used to detect leakage of pipe systems on automobiles, motorcycles, snowmobiles, ATVs, light trucks, and speedboats.

It is suitable for all makes and models of cars.

Read more

Pressure Gauge Displays

NO Leak: When the value of the pressure gauge remains unchanged, it means that there is no leakage in the system.

Small Leak: When the value of the pressure gauge drops, it indicates a small leak in the system.

Massive Leak: When the value of the pressure gauge reaches zero, it indicates a large leak in the system.

Fast Smoke Output

This machine built-in air compressor, with superior wick and heating element.

It can produce smoke instantly by heating up USP mineral oil or baby oil. 4ft Smoke Outlet Pipe can help reach and connect perfectly.

Note: Use baby oil, Pure #5 white oil is the best choice if available.

Notice before Leak Test

Turn OFF the Ignition of Your Vehicle.

It can’t be connected to the 12v power supply in the office, or it cannot output the smoke.It just support a 12V battery with a current range of 8A-10A (Ordinary car batteries are eligible).

Read more

5
Price: $165.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:43:34 UTC – Details)

Fast Smoke Output

This machine built-in air compressor, with superior wick and heating element.

It can produce smoke instantly by heating up USP mineral oil or baby oil. 4ft Smoke Outlet Pipe can help reach and connect perfectly.

Note: Use baby oil, Pure #5 white oil is the best choice if available.

Notice before Leak Test

Turn OFF the Ignition of Your Vehicle.

It can’t be connected to the 12v power supply in the office, or it cannot output the smoke.It just support a 12V battery with a current range of 8A-10A (Ordinary car batteries are eligible).

Read more

item.title: Automotive Smoke Machine Leak Detector, VXSCAN EVAP Vacuum Leakage Tester, Fuel Pipe Diagnostic Tester with Flow Meter & Pressure Gauge for All 12V Vehicles
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) From the brand About VXSCAN Since our founding, VXSCAN has been committed to providing the best products, prices and services to the automotive tool market. We develop the tools for you and the market, and then we use and test them over and over to ensure everyone can enjoy our ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $179.99 - $165.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:19:41 UTC – Details)

From the brand

About VXSCAN

Since our founding, VXSCAN has been committed to providing the best products, prices and services to the automotive tool market. We develop the tools for you and the market, and then we use and test them over and over to ensure everyone can enjoy our high-quality products.

VXSCAN’s Value

VXSCAN has the most comprehensive product portfolio, dedicated staff and dedicated technical team to help you with all your vehicle needs and projects.

VXSCAN’s Vision

We share the same passion for vehicles as you do. Our focus is to provide you with the ultimate experience through exceptional service.

VXSCAN’s Mission

To provide professional, efficient and high quality automotive diagnostic products so that every car owner around the world can enjoy a better life made possible by technology.

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 10.67 x 9.88 x 6.85 inches; 5.2 Pounds
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ May 19, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ VXSCAN
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0B1QGP86W

【EVAP SMOKE MACHINE】VXSCAN V3 is a professional vacuum machine for car fuel pipe system leak detection. Supports EVAP system test, tightness test, intake system test, exhaust system test and various pipe fittings test. V3 smoke leak detector will help you solve the problem, saving time and money.
【EASY TO USE】By heating USP mineral oil or baby oil, the automotive smoke machine can be outputs lots of smoke within 30 seconds, to improve diagnosis efficiency. This evap smoke machine built-in air pump, you don’t need to purchase extra. V3 help you control the smoke effect easily and allowing you to estimate the size of the leak by the change of the gauge value.
【SMOKE FLOW METER & PRESSURE GAUGE】Equipped with pressure gauge and adjustable flow meter which helps you control the smoke effect easily. When the pressure gauge runs to the maximum, the flow meter drops to 0, indicating that your pipeline is not leaking. On the contrary, it means there is smoke leakage.
【Air Mode & Smoke Mode】The V3 smoke leak tester adopts an independent switch control design, the air mode independently controls the built-in air pump, the smoke mode independently controls the smoke generator. With intelligent protection, if the working limit is exceeded, the power will be automatically turned off to ensure the safety of the operator and equipment.
【WIDELY COMPATIBILITY】Our package includes all accessories (Oil not included), it supports detect the leaks of multi pipe systems on cars, motorcycles, snowmobiles, off-road vehicles, ATVs, light trucks and speedboats boats. The fuel pipeline leak diagnostic machine is suitable for all brands and models of cars.

VXSCAN V3 Automotive Smoke Machine is a universal and professional auto pipe leak detect tool, it will help us position cars motorcycles leakage on the pipe systems quickly and exactly.

VXSCAN V3 TESTER SUPPORTS:

  • Crankcase System Test
  • Intake System Test
  • Car Sealing Test
  • Fuel Tank System Test
  • Turbo Leaks Test
  • Various Pipe Fittings Test
  • Exhaust System Test
  • EVAP System Test

V3 evap smoke machine can produce lots of smoke within 30s, help mechanic detect the leaks in pipe system.

2 MODE CONTROL:

  • Smoke Control: After pressing this switch, the power indicator light is on to indicate that the power supply is normal.
  • Air Control: Press the AIR MODE, pump starts working, only after this, you may press and start the SMOKE MODE.

Read more

What’s In the Box

  • 1pcs * Car Smoke Leak Detector
  • 1pcs * Hook (with hand-tighten nuts)
  • 1pcs * Universal Intake Bladder
  • 1pcs * Intake Bladder Replacement Rubber
  • 1pcs * Smoke Hose
  • 1pcs * Power Cord
  • 1pcs * Funnel & Oil Bottle (No oil includ)
  • 1pcs * User Manual

Notice before Leak Test

  • Turn OFF the Ignition of Your Vehicle
  • Use baby oil, Pure #5 white oil is the best choice if available.
  • Only support a 12V battery with a current range of 8-10A. (Ordinary car batteries are eligible)
Specification

  • Output Pressure: 7-12 PSI
  • Output Flow: <6 L/Min
  • Power Supply: 12V automobile Battery 6Amp
  • Air Pressure Output: Built-in air pump
  • Test Oil Capacity: 10-20ml
  • Length of Power Cord: 2.5Meters
  • Length of Smoke Hose: 2.5Meters
  • Package Weight: 2.3kg/5 lb
  • Main Unit Dimensions: 7.28*5.11*3.34 inch
  • Package Dimensions: 12.2*9.44*4.52 inch

Read more

How to

  • Fill 10-20ml baby oil to the evap smoke machine for the first time (Do not inject too much at once).
  • Open the engine cover, and hang the detector in the cover.

Use

  • Disconnect the pipes that need to be connected with the smoke leak detector.
  • Insert universal Adapter Cone or other accessories and test pipe.

Leak

  • Connect your car leak test machine power cord to the 12V vehicle battery (red clip to battery positive, black clip to ground, then the power LED will light up, otherwise you need to check the power)
  • Inset the Smoke delivery hose to ddapter cone.

Tester

  • Press Air Control Switch, wait for seconds until the system is pressurized, check the Pressure Gauge & Flow Meter reading for leak status. Turn on the smoke generator, adjust the smoke amount to suitable amount so you can locate the leak position quickly.
  • The leak can be judged according to where the smoke appears.

Read more

Pressure Gauge

Displays the output pressure of the machine or show the real time pressure of the system been testing.

NO Leak: When the value of the pressure gauge remains unchanged, it means that there is no leakage in the system.

Small Leak: When the value of the pressure gauge drops, it indicates a small leak in the system.

Massive Leak: When the value of the pressure gauge reaches zero, it indicates a large leak in the system.

Air Flow Meter

Provide a quick visual indication of the amount of air/smoke passing through the system being tested.

Check the Pressure Gauge & Flow Meter reading for leak status, V3 evap smoke machine can help you find and fix leak problems quickly!

Overload Protection

VXSCAN V3 automotive smoke machine leak detector has built in self-protective system: Overheat and Anti-frost Protection. When the temperature of the device exceeds 120℃, power protection will be intelligently activated to turn it off. The device can also work normally at -20℃. You don’t have to worry about switching on and off the machine constantly during diagnosis. The system takes care of the load for you.

Read more

4.5
Price: $179.99 - $165.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:19:41 UTC – Details)

Walking with Your Dog In Car For Dog Whelping Moms At Home Yicostar Dog Water ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $19.99 - $15.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 05:03:19 UTC – Details)

Product Description

The bottle is portable and lightweight, you can carry it all times when you have your dog with you, in car, for walks, shopping, at beach and everywhere your dog goes with you.

Walking with Your Dog

In Car

For Dog Whelping Moms

At Home

Yicostar Dog Water Bottle, A Perfect Dog Water Dispenser for Drinking Water On the Go!

Features:

– No water waste, if your dog doesn’t finish the water, simply press the button and tilt back, and the water will flow back into the bottle, no waste.

– 12oz and large 19oz capacity, mint, pink, blue colors available, you could pick one per your request.

– The silica gel seal ring and the lock feature to prevent the button from accidentally getting pressed so water doesn’t leak out.

– Perfect for when you take your dog walking, traveling, hiking, camping or everywhere your dog goes with you.

– Perfect for small, medium, large sized dog, and don’t worry about wasting water.

– A great one-handed solution to keeping your pet cool on the go.

– Durable and safe material.

– Easy to use and convenient, with the strap you could tie it to your purse while walking so that you don’t have to worry about holding it.

– Ideal gift to your dog friends and family member.

Kindly Note:

– Keep the bottle away from hot water or any drinks over 176℉/80℃.

– Don’t put it in dishwasher or microwave.

– Don’t press the button hard when lock key is locking.

– Don’t fill bottle with dry ice, chocolate, soda, milk or other milk drink.

Specifications:

Product Name: Dog Water Bottle for Walking

Capacity: 12oz(350ml), 19oz(550ml)

Colors: Mint, Blue, Pink

Cup Material: PC

Trough Material: ABS

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 2.95 x 2.95 x 10.24 inches; 7.76 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ CXHAFDL006
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ April 2, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Yicostar
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B088YHKDCT

LEAK PROOF – The silica gel seal ring and the lock feature to prevent the button from accidentally getting pressed so water doesn’t leak out, you could put the pet water bottle in the car or backpack or purse, no worry to get wet.
LARGE 19OZ CAPACITY – Large capacity 19oz dog water bottle, perfect for taking your large and medium breed dogs for outdoor walking, hiking, traveling or any outdoor activities.
EASY TO CARRY – The portable dog water bottle for walking is lightweight and has a strap for carrying, you can carry it all times when you have your dog with you, in car, for walks, shopping, at beach and everywhere your dog goes with you.
NICE GIFT TO PET HUMANS – If your dog friend constantly stress about having water for the dog when they take the dog out, this travel water bottle would help, they will be excited to have a convenient way to be sure their pup is hydrated while on the go!
